name: Excel Publishing Company Limited
description:
Excel Publishing is a leading business to business publisher providing a wide ranging portfolio of professional products for the business community regionally, nationally and internationally. As the largest independent publisher in the North of England, Excel also has the ability to react quickly to industry changes across a broad spectrum of sectors, creating innovative products that meet our readers and customers’ needs.

We have three publications covering Ecobuild extensively, Eco-Construct, Timber in Construction and Builder & Engineer and we are working on our previews up until the 18th of February, so call us now and find out about our fantastic multi-media package designed to get visitors flocking to your stand.

Call Terry Hanlon now on 0161 661 4120.
